caption.p: ( a) Schematic diagram of enhanced substrate preparation; ( b) SEM image of a surface-enhanced Raman scattering (SERS) substrate; ( c) X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) tests on modified gold film (red line) and no modified gold film (black line); ( d) XPS nitrogen (N1s) spectrum for modified gold film; ( e) size distribution of the Ag nanoparticles.
